attributes.action: Abolish VAT on heating Bills for customers over the age of 65
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: VAT on domestic heating bills was introduced by the Major Government 1992-7.  It is one of the most unfair taxes ever introduced and is a driect attack on vunerable peoples income.  Whilst the government has cut the tax I feel they should go further and abolish it for pensioners
